attributes.action: Amend the Regulation of Investigatory Powers Act 2000 so that these powers may  be used ONLY by the Police and HM Customs in active pursuit of enquiries into serious organised crime ,terrorism, drug smugglin and smuggling of illegal imigrants andsex slaves.All other agencies sush as local councils should be forbidden to spy on law abiding citizens in pursuit of minor offences.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
